evidence.claim: The Health Innovation Lab utilizes AWS for cloud services.
They implement HL7 standards for healthcare data transmission.
Use of Azure services for data integration and storage in health records.
They follow FHIR standards for interoperability in health data exchange.
EDI capabilities with X12 transaction sets are part of their integration framework.

icp.icp_reason: No direct evidence found on site for X12 transaction usage or API automation.
